label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Buybackprevents gainingunreliable gold(creeps, neutrals, etc.) until your normal respawn time finishes

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • When buying back, 25% of the remaining respawn time will be added to your next death

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Lane Creepsnow meet a bit closer to the tower in yourofflane

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ranged Heroes now get the samedenied experienceas melee heroes (instead of less)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • XPAoE increased from 1200 to 1300

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Non-AncientNeutralsnow split XP with all heroes in the AoE instead of just the team that killed them

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Swapped the medium pullable Neutral Camp with the small camp

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • A neutral creeps camp will no longer spawn the same set of neutral creeps twice in a row

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Small reduction to thepull timingduration of the mid Radiant and mid-top Dire camp

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Satyr MindstealerXP bounty reduced from 88 to 62

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Satyr TormentorXP bounty reduced from 155 to 119

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Mud GolemsXP bounty reduced from 119 to 88

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Mud Golems armor reduced from 4 to 2

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Dark Troll Summonerbounty XP reduced from 155 to 119

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Hellbear SmasherHP reduced from 1100 to 950

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Hellbear armor reduced from 5 to 3

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Satyr Trickster's Purge cast point improved from 0.5 to 0.2

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Fixed NeutralEnvenomed Weaponsdebuff dispelling regen items

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Day/Night length decreased from 6 to 4 minutes

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • The following heroes now have the standard 800 night vision:Drow Ranger,Mirana,Puck,Leshrac,Enchantress,Ancient Apparition,Meepo, andTreant Protector

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Roshanwill respawn at a random time between 8 and 11 minutes after death

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • WhenAegisexpires unused, it heals the hero fully over 5 seconds (regen dispels on damage from players or buildings)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Starting goldincreased from 603 to 625

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Random gold bonus reduced by 50

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Gold for ending a spree changed from 75➜600 (3×➜10×) to 125➜1000

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Your gold income is now 1 per 0.6 seconds, up from 1 per 0.8 seconds

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Towerlast hit bonus gold increased from 100-200 to 150-250

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Melee BarracksHP regen increased from 2.5 to 5

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ranged BarracksHP regen decreased from 2.5 to 0

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ranged Barracks HP reduced from 1500 to 1200 and armor increased from 5 to 10 (same EHP vs physical damage)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Evasionnow stacks diminishingly

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Can no longer orb-attack while attack restricted (such asEtherealorFrostbite)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • The following abilities no longer automatically ignore backswing time by default:Rupture,Malefice,Venomous Gale,Stifling Dagger,Flamebreak,Wave of Terror,Shadow Word, andPower Cogs

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • BroodmotherandSlarkare temporarily disabled fromCaptains Mode, they will be added back shortly

label: Abaddon
descriptionHtml:
• Base armor reduced by 1
  • Mist Coilself damage increased from 50/75/100/125 to 75/100/125/150
  • Aphotic Shieldis nowdispellable
  • Borrowed Timeno longer activates whileDoomed

label: Alchemist
descriptionHtml:
• Chemical Rageno longer provides 250/500/750 bonus HP
  • Chemical Rage HP regen increased from 15/30/60 to 50/75/100

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml:
• Ice Vortexcooldown reduced from 5 to 4
  • Ice Blastcooldown reduced from 45 to 40
  • TheChilling Touchbuff is now always applied to Ancient Apparition even if he is not within the target area
  • Chilling Touch cooldown reduced from 50/46/42/38 to 50/42/34/26

label: Axe
descriptionHtml:
• Berserker's CallAoE increased from 275 to 300
  • Battle Hungerduration reduced from 10/13/16/19 to 10/12/14/16
  • Battle Hunger damage reduced from 15/21/27/33 to 15/20/25/30
  • Battle Hunger movement speed slow/bonus increased from 8% to 10%
  • Battle Hunger is now dispellable
  • Counter Helixcooldown reduced from 0.55/0.5/0.45/0.4 to 0.45/0.4/0.35/0.3
  • Counter Helix now hits siege units
  • Culling Bladeno longer goes on cooldown if it successfully kills a hero
  • Culling Blade threshold reduced from 300/450/625 to 250/350/450 (Aghanim upgraded version is still 300/450/625)
  • Culling Blade speed bonus increased from 25% to 40% and AoE from 600 to 900
  • Culling Blade 40% speed bonus now applies to attack speed as well
  • Culling Blade Aghanim allied buff duration increased from 6 to 10
  • Culling Blade mana cost reduced from 150/200/250 to 60/120/180

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage reduced from 48-52 to 38-42
  • Visionreduced from 1400 to 1200
  • Flaming Lassocast range reduced from 175 to 100

label: Beastmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Inner BeastAoE reduced from 1000 to 900 (standard aura AoE)
  • Inner Beast attack speed rescaled from 18/26/32/40 to 15/25/35/45
  • Call of the Wildnow has two abilities for summoning each unit independently
  • Call of the Wild mana cost reduced from 25 to 15 and cast point improved from 0.5 to 03

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml:
• Base movement speed reduced from 305 to 300
  • Thirstis now global instead of 6000 range
  • Thirst bonus now stacks for each unit that is low HP
  • Thirst HP threshold increased from 20/30/40/50% to 50%
  • Thirst movement speed bonus reduced from 15/25/35/45% to 7/14/21/28%
  • When Thirst is active, movement speed cap is removed on your hero
  • Thirst no longer provides armor bonus
  • Thirst provides bonus 7/14/21/28 damage
  • Thirst no longer grants full hero vision around low HP targets, it only shows their model
  • Thirst no longer lasts for an extra 3 seconds when the target is dead

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Base agility increased from 16 to 22
  • Drunken Hazeaffects a 200 AoE around the target
  • Thunder Clapis now dispellable
  • Primal Splitselection order is now Earth/Storm/Fire
  • Reworked Primal Split Aghanim upgrade
    • No longer upgrades any stats, cd, duration, etc. on Aghanim
    • Instead, it now grants Thunderclap to Earth, Drunken Haze to Storm, andDrunken Brawlerto Fire
    • The skills granted are at the same level as Brewmaster's skills
    • Cooldowns are independent of the original Brewmaster

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml:
• Attack point improved from 0.4 to 0.3
  • Viscous Nasal Goois now dispellable
  • Viscous Nasal Goo cast point improved from 0.4 to 0.3
  • Warpathmax stacks increased from 5 to 5/6/7
  • Warpath stack duration increased from 10 to 14

label: Broodmother
descriptionHtml:
• Spin WebAoE increased from 650 to 900
  • Spin Web cast range increased from 600 to 1000
  • Spin Web cast point nerfed from 0.2 to 0.4
  • Spin Web no longer destroys trees
  • Broodmother now has completely unobstructed movement when under the web (can walk over cliffs, trees, etc.)
  • Removed buffer time when leaving Spin Web (you now immediately lose your regen/movement/pathing/invis bonuses)

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml: • Stampedeslow duration increased from 1.25 seconds to 1.5

label: Chaos Knight
descriptionHtml: • Chaos Boltdamage and stun values are now inversely related

label: Chen
descriptionHtml:
• Test of Faithteleport is now dispellable
  • Hand of Godcooldown increased from 140/130/120 to 160/140/120

label: Clinkz
descriptionHtml:
• Searing Arrowsdamage increased from 20/30/40/50 to 30/40/50/60
  • Searing Arrows mana cost increased from 8 to 10
  • Searing Arrows is no longer blocked by magic immunity

label: Clockwerk
descriptionHtml: • Units knocked back byPower Cogsdestroy trees in 100 AoE around where they land

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml:
• Freezing FieldAS/MS AoE slow increased from -20/-30 to -30/-30
  • Freezing Field Scepter AS/MS AoE slow increased from -50/-30 to -50/-50

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml: • Vacuumcooldown increased from 24 to 28

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml:
• Weaveduration rescaled from 12/18/24 to 20
  • Weave armor per second rescaled from 1 to 0.75/1/1.25 (scepter is 1/1.25/1.5)
  • Poison Touchdamage increased from 8/16/24/32 to 14/20/26/32 (7 seconds worth)
  • Poison Touch is now dodgeable
  • Poison Touch slow timings reworked

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml: • ExorcismSpirit damage increased from 43-48 to 53-58

label: Disruptor
descriptionHtml:
• Kinetic FieldAoE increased from 300 to 325
  • Glimpsecooldown reduced from 60/50/40/30 to 65/50/35/20
  • Static StormAoE increased from 375 to 450
  • Static Storm max damage increased from 170/220/270 to 200/250/300
  • Added Aghanim's upgrade: Static Storm silences items and lasts an extra 2 seconds

label: Doom
descriptionHtml:
• Doomcooldown reduced from 110 to 100
  • Doom now removes positive buffs on the target before applying the debuff
  • Doom Aghanim AoE requirement increased from 550 to 900
    • This is the AoE that is considered when freezing the duration of Aghanim upgraded Doom

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml:
• Precision Auradamage ratio increased from 16/20/24/28% to 18/24/30/36%
  • Precision Aura no longer affects creeps
  • Precision Aura can now be manually casted to affect creeps globally for 30 seconds (120 cd)
  • Marksmanshipattribute negation AoE increased from 375 to 400

label: Earth Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Boulder Smashrock push distance reduced from 2400 to 2000
  • Boulder Smash can target a point to push the nearest rock within 180 aoe

label: Earthshaker
descriptionHtml:
• Enchant Totemdamage increased from 75/150/225/300% to 100/200/300/400%
  • Fissurerange increased by 100

label: Elder Titan
descriptionHtml: • Astral Spiritdamage reduced from 120/160/200/240 to 80/120/160/200

label: Ember Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Fire Remnantmovement path now kills trees

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml:
• Midnight Pulsedps increased from 3/4/5/6% to 4/5/6/7%
  • Added Aghanim's upgrade: Adds Midnight Pulse damage to your Black Hole (This damage stacks with Midnight Pulse)

label: Enchantress
descriptionHtml: • Untouchableattack speed slow increased from 20/50/80/110 to 30/60/90/120

label: Faceless Void
descriptionHtml:
• Time Walkslow rescaled from 25/30/35/40% to 20/30/40/50%
  • ChronosphereAoE increased from 400 to 450

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml:
• Agility reduced from 20 + 2.4 to 15 + 1.4
  • Berserker's Bloodis now disabled by Doom

label: Invoker
descriptionHtml:
• EMPrestores Invoker for 50% of the mana it drains from heroes (excluding illusions)
  • InvokeMax Spells rescaled from 1/2/2/2 to 2

label: Io
descriptionHtml: • Tethernow does a -100% MS/AS slow instead of a stun

label: Jakiro
descriptionHtml: • Liquid Fireis now a castable Attack Orb (same cooldown, no mana cost)

label: Juggernaut
descriptionHtml:
• Healing Wardmovement speed increased from 300 to 450
  • OmnislashScepter cooldown reduced from 110/100/90 to 70
  • Omnislash no longer stops if the target is Ethereal (it still doesn't do damage)
  • Fixed not being able to use items during Omnislash

label: Keeper of the Light
descriptionHtml: • Blinding Lightnow destroys trees in a 150 AoE around where the target is pushed

label: Kunkka
descriptionHtml:
• X Marks The Spotcooldown reduced from 16 to 13
  • Ghost Shipdamage increased from 350/450/550 to 400/500/600

label: Legion Commander
descriptionHtml:
• Base movement speed increased from 310 to 320
  • Overwhelming Oddsbase damage from 60/120/180/240 to 50/100/150/200
  • Overwhelming Odds bonus damage per unit increased from 10 to 14/16/18/20
  • Duelcast range increased from 100 to 150
  • Press The Attackduration increased from 4 to 5

label: Leshrac
descriptionHtml:
• Diabolic Edictcast point improved from 0.7 to 0.5
  • Pulse Novascepter damage increased from 88/133/177 to 100/150/200

label: Lich
descriptionHtml:
• Ice Armorhas half effect against ranged heroes
  • Ice Armor slow now stacks with the slow fromFrost Blast
  • Sacrificecooldown increased from 35/30/25/20 to 44/36/28/20
  • Sacrifice mana gain increased from 15/30/45/60% to 25/40/55/70%
  • Sacrifice no longer denies enemy XP
  • Sacrifice now converts your own creep for XP (shared in AoE as normal creep xp bounty)

label: Lifestealer
descriptionHtml:
• Ragecooldown increased from 17 to 19
  • Open Woundsand Infest cast points increased from 0.01 to 02

label: Lina
descriptionHtml: • Attack rangeincreased from 635 to 650

label: Lion
descriptionHtml:
• Mana Drainduration increased from 4 to 5
  • Hexcooldown increased from 15 to 30/25/20/15
  • Hex duration increased from 1.75/2.5/3.25/4 to 2.5/3/35/4

label: Lone Druid
descriptionHtml:
• Base movement speed increased from 315 to 325 (still 280 in True Form)
  • Spirit BearXP bounty increased from 196 to 300

label: Luna
descriptionHtml:
• Moon Glaivecan now bounce back on the same units if it already hit all other units nearby
  • Moon Glaive bounce damage reduced from -30% to -35%
  • EclipseScepter beam count limit per target removed

label: Lycan
descriptionHtml:
• Armor increased by 1 (Shapeshifttotal armor is still the same as before)
  • Base damage increased by 5
  • Howlbonus damage for non-hero units increased from 4/8/12/16 to 5/10/15/20
  • Lycan Wolvesmagic resistance increased from 50% to 80%

label: Magnus
descriptionHtml: • Turn rateimproved from 0.5 to 0.8

label: Medusa
descriptionHtml: • Mystic Snakenow does Pure damage to units in Stone Form

label: Meepo
descriptionHtml:
• Base armor reduced by 1
  • Turn rate improved from 0.5 to 0.65
  • Earthbindcast point improved from 0.5 to 0.3
  • Divided We Standleveling rebalanced from 6/11/16 to 4/11/18
  • Removed 30% stat sharing on non-aghanim Divided We Stand

label: Mirana
descriptionHtml:
• LeapAoE AS/MS speed bonus is granted at the cast location rather than the destination
  • Leap AoE AS bonus increased from 4/8/12/16 to 8/16/24/32

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml: • Morphlevel 4 shift rate improved from 0.25 to 0.2

label: Naga Siren
descriptionHtml:
• Rip TideAoE reduced from 450 to 350
  • Ensnaremana cost increased from 75/85/95/105 to 90/100/110/120

label: Nature's Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• TreantXP Bounty increased from 20 to 30
  • Treant Gold Bounty increased from 12-16 to 14-20

label: Necrophos
descriptionHtml: • Base armor increased by 1

label: Night Stalker
descriptionHtml: • Darknesscauses enemy vision to be reduced by 25% (affects heroes, creeps and wards)

label: Nyx Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Spiked Carapaceno longer stuns your hero when your summoned units proc it (the summoned units get stunned instead)
  • Impaleno longer has unit targeting, it is now only a point targeted spell

label: Ogre Magi
descriptionHtml:
• Igniteduration increased from 4/5/6/7 to 5/6/7/8
  • Ignite is now dodgeable
  • Ignite can now multicast to cast at a random enemy unit in 1400 AoE (prioritizes ones that do not already have the debuff)
  • Unrefined Fireblastcooldown reduced from 10 to 6

label: Omniknight
descriptionHtml:
• Degen AuraAoE increased from 315 to 350
  • Degen Aura stickiness increased from 0.5 seconds to 10

label: Oracle
descriptionHtml:
• False Promisemana cost from 100 to 200
  • False Promise cast range reduced from 1500 to 1000

label: Outworld Devourer
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage reduced by 3
  • Items no longer triggerEssence Aura

label: Phantom Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Stifling Daggershares the same crit chance/factor asCoup de Grace
  • Stifling Dagger is now dodgeable
  • Stifling Dagger damage rescaled from 50/100/150/200 to 60/100/140/180

label: Phantom Lancer
descriptionHtml: • Spirit Lanceis now dodgeable

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml: • Sun RayHP cost increased from 4% of current HP to 6%

label: Pudge
descriptionHtml:
• Can now useBlink Dagger
  • If youhooka unit onto an unpathable ledge, the unit gains free pathing for 5 seconds
  • Flesh Heapmagic resistance reduced from 4/8/12/16% to 6/8/10/12%
  • DismemberScepter strength multiplier increased from 0.75 to 10

label: Pugna
descriptionHtml:
• Decrepifydamage amp on allies reduced from 40% to 25%
  • Decrepify damage amp on enemies increased from 40% to 50%
  • Nether Wardnow requires 3 hits to kill instead of 75/150/225/300 HP (heroes hurt it for 1, others for 0.25)
  • Life Drainrestores mana if it tries to heal you while you are full hp when targeting heroes

label: Queen of Pain
descriptionHtml: • Shadow Strikemana cost rescaled from 80/100/120/140 to 110

label: Riki
descriptionHtml:
• Smoke Screencast range increased from 425 to 550
  • Riki is no longer revealed out ofPermanent Invisibilitywhen he casts spells or uses items
    • When he starts his attack from Blink Strike, he will be revealed

label: Rubick
descriptionHtml:
• Telekinesiscooldown increased from 18 to 22
  • Rubick can no longer steal the Aghanim upgrade of the enemy if they have Aghanim and he doesn't
  • Added Aghanim's upgrade: reduces cooldown from 20/18/16 to 5, increases cast range from 1000 to 1400, and makes all stolen spells be considered to have their Aghanim's upgrade

label: Sand King
descriptionHtml:
• Sand Stormdps increased from 20/40/60/80 to 25/50/75/100
  • Epicenterattack speed slow is now same as movement speed slow (10%➜30%)

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml: • Shadow PoisonAoE increased from 180 to 190

label: Shadow Shaman
descriptionHtml:
• Mass Serpent Wardcount increased from 8 to 10
  • Changed Mass Serpent Ward placement structure

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml: • Intelligence Stealis an innate part of the hero rather than an element ofGlaives of Wisdom

label: Skeleton King
descriptionHtml:
• Base Intelligence increased by 5
  • RemovedMortal Strikeactive
  • Vampiric Auranow provides full effectiveness on ranged units
  • Reincarnationslow increased from 30% to 50%
  • Reincarnation slow AoE increased from 700 to 900

label: Skywrath Mage
descriptionHtml:
• Int growth increased from 3.2 to 3.6
  • Added Aghanim's upgrade: reducesMystic Flare's cooldown from 60/40/20 to 20/10/0

label: Slardar
descriptionHtml:
• Amplify Damagearmor reduction increased from 8/14/20 to 10/15/20
  • Sprintspeed increased from 20/27/33/40% to 20/28/36/44%
  • Sprint mana cost removed (was 50)

label: Slark
descriptionHtml:
• Shadow Danceduration reduced from 5.5 to 4
  • Shadow Dance cooldown increased from 25 to 65
  • Shadow Dance can no longer be revealed byTrue Sight

label: Sniper
descriptionHtml: • Take Aimattack range bonus increased from 75/150/225/300 to 80/160/240/320

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml: • Metamorphosisduration from 40 to 40/44/48/52

label: Spectre
descriptionHtml:
• You can now continuously useRealityon your illusions
  • Reality cast point improved from 0.3 to 0

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml:
• Base attack time nerfed from 1.7 to 1.9
  • Greater Bashno longer works whiledoomed
  • Nether Strikenow uses 1.2 Cast Time instead of a 1 sec magic immune delay (can be interrupted as a result)

label: Sven
descriptionHtml:
• Storm Hammercooldown reduced from 15 to 13
  • Storm Hammer is now dodgeable

label: Tidehunter
descriptionHtml: • Kraken Shelldamage block increased from 7/14/21/28 to 9/18/27/36

label: Timbersaw
descriptionHtml: • Chakrammana cost increased from 75/125/175 to 100/150/200

label: Tiny
descriptionHtml:
• Craggy Exteriorchance increased from 6/12/18/24% to 10/15/20/25%
  • Craggy Exterior stun duration increased from 1.2 to 1.2/1.3/1.4/15

label: Treant Protector
descriptionHtml:
• Leech Seeddamage per pulse reduced from 30/45/60/75 to 24/36/48/60
  • Leech Seed number of pulses increased from 4 to 6 (duration from 3 to 4.5)
  • Living Armorcooldown rebalanced from 15 to 32/26/20/14
  • Living Armor mana cost increased from 25 to 50
  • Nature's Guisecast point improved from 0.5 to 03

label: Troll Warlord
descriptionHtml:
• Berserker's Ragemovespeed bonus rebalanced from 20/20/20/30 to 10/20/30/40
  • Whirling Axes (Melee)damage reduced from 125/175/225/275 to 75/125/175/225

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml: • Frozen Sigilnow requires a constant number of hits (3/3/4/4) instead of 200/220/240/260 HP (heroes hurt it for 1, others for 025)

label: Undying
descriptionHtml: • Decaysteal duration increased from 25/30/35/40 to 40

label: Vengeful Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Can now useBlink Dagger
  • If youNether Swapa unit onto an unpathable ledge, the unit gains free pathing for 5 seconds

label: Venomancer
descriptionHtml:
• Poison Novano longer ignores invis/fogged units
  • Venomous Galeno longer ignores invis units
  • Venomous Gale damage over time rebalanced from 15/30/45/60 to 0/30/60/90
  • Poison Stingduration increased from 6/8/10/12 to 6/9/12/15
  • Poison Sting dps no longer dispels healing or disables dagger
  • Plague Wardsnow have Poison Sting for 50% of the damage at the current skilled level (When both Venomancer and a Plague Ward affect a target, only the highest dps is applied)
  • Plague Wards XP bounty increased from 12/12/25/25 to 20/25/30/35

label: Viper
descriptionHtml:
• Poison Attackcooldown reduced from 4/3/0/0 to 0
  • Corrosive Skinno longer works whiledoomed

label: Visage
descriptionHtml:
• Base armor reduced by 1
  • Base magic resistance reduced from 25% to 10%

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml:
• Fatal Bondsnow links the closest units to the initial target, instead of randomly choosing targets in its AoE
  • Upheavalcast range increased from 700 to 1200
  • Upheaval duration increased from 10 to 12
  • RemovedChaotic Offering100 impact damage
  • Chaotic Offering Golem armor increased from 5/7/10 to 6/9/12
  • Chaotic Offering mana cost increased from 200/250/300 to 200/300/400

label: Weaver
descriptionHtml: • Base attack timenerfed from 1.7 to 1.8

label: Windranger
descriptionHtml:
• Focus Fireremains sticky on the target you cast it on
    • This means that you can change targets and when you return to the original target, your attack speed bonus will resume

label: Witch Doctor
descriptionHtml:
• Death Wardcast range increased from 400 to 600
  • Voodoo RestorationAoE increased from 350 to 500
  • Voodoo Restoration mana cost over time reduced from 8/14/20/26 to 8/12/16/20 (50% of the heal amount)
  • Paralyzing Casknow lasts 5 seconds on illusions (same as creep duration)

label: Animal Courier
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed increased from 300 to 350
  • HP increased from 45 to 75

label: Arcane Boots
descriptionHtml: • Movement speed bonus reduced from 60 to 55

label: Armlet of Mordiggian
descriptionHtml:
• Unholy StrengthSTR gain is provided over 0.7 seconds
  • Unholy Strength has no toggle on or off cooldown

label: Black King Bar
descriptionHtml: • Recipecost increased from 1300 to 1375

label: Blink Dagger
descriptionHtml:
• Damage disable no longer ignores self damage
    • This means stuff likeRotwill trigger it, but HP loss likeSoul Ringwill not

label: Bloodstone
descriptionHtml: • Now gives the +10 damage from its components

label: Boots of Travel
descriptionHtml: • Now prioritizes nearby structures first within 325 AoE from targeting position (when ground targeted)

label: Bottle
descriptionHtml: • Gold cost increased from 600 to 650

label: Clarity
descriptionHtml: • Is no longer shareable (but can still be used on a target ally)

label: Dust of Appearance
descriptionHtml: • Slow increased from 10 to 15%

label: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
descriptionHtml:
• Cyclonecooldown reduced from 30 to 25
  • Movement speed bonus increased from 35 to 40

label: Eye of Skadi
descriptionHtml: • Eye of Skadi MS/AS slow increased from 30/20 to 35/35

label: Flying Courier
descriptionHtml: • Cannot be purchased until 3 minutes after creeps spawn

label: Gem of True Sight
descriptionHtml: • Gold cost increased from 850 to 900

label: Hand of Midas
descriptionHtml: • Transmuteno longer works againstNecronomiconunits

label: Healing Salve
descriptionHtml:
• Gold cost increased from 100 to 115
  • Is no longershareable(but can still be used on a target ally)

label: Helm of the Dominator
descriptionHtml: • Dominatecan no longer controlNecronomiconunits

label: Hyperstone
descriptionHtml: • Gold cost reduced from 2100 to 2000

label: Linken's Sphere
descriptionHtml:
• Linken's Sphere can now be cast on an allied hero to transfer the buff
    • When on cooldown it does not work on you
    • Goes into cooldown when cast and once the buff is used up
    • If the cooldown ends and the buff has not been used up, the buff ends and does not trigger another cooldown
    • 700 cast range

label: Maelstrom
descriptionHtml: • Chain LightningAoE increased from 500 to 900

label: Mjollnir
descriptionHtml:
• Static Chargeradius around attacker increased from 300 to 450
  • Static Charge hit count increased from 3 to 5
  • Chain LightningAoE increased from 500 to 900

label: Necronomicon
descriptionHtml: • Summoned units duration increased from 35 to 40

label: Observer Ward
descriptionHtml:
• Duration increased from 6 to 7 minutes
  • Killing Observer Wards now grants a 50 gold bounty

label: Phase Boots
descriptionHtml: • Movement speed bonus reduced from 55 to 50

label: Pipe of Insight
descriptionHtml: • BarrierAoE increased from 500 to 900

label: Power Treads
descriptionHtml: • Movement speed bonus reduced from 55 to 50

label: Radiance
descriptionHtml: • Burn DamageAoE increased from 650 to 700

label: Refresher Orb
descriptionHtml: • Now gives the +10 attack speed from its components

label: Rod of Atos
descriptionHtml: • Cripplecooldown reduced from 16 to 12

label: Sange and Yasha
descriptionHtml: • Movement speed bonus increased from 12 to 16%

label: Sentry Ward
descriptionHtml:
• Duration increased from 3 to 4 minutes
  • No longer gives permanent vision around it
  • Gives ground vision in a 150 area around it for 12 seconds when placed

label: Shadow Amulet
descriptionHtml: • Fade delay reduced from 2.4 to 1.8

label: Shadow Blade
descriptionHtml: • Shadow Walkcooldown increased from 18 to 28

label: Smoke of Deceit
descriptionHtml: • Smoked units are now always hidden until the buff is removed (rather than being hidden only from minimap and partially from world)

label: Tango
descriptionHtml:
• Charges increased from 3 to 4
  • Gold cost increased from 90 to 125
  • Is no longershareable
  • Tango can be targeted on an allied hero to create a 1 charge non-stacking tango item in their inventory. If the inventory is full, the item will be placed on the ground. This item has a 60s cooldown.

label: Tranquil Boots
descriptionHtml: • Reworked Tranquil Boots

label: Urn of Shadows
descriptionHtml: • Soul Releasecooldown reduced from 10 to 7

label: Vanguard
descriptionHtml: • Damage Blockchance increased from 70 to 80%

label: Veil of Discord
descriptionHtml:
• Now usesNull Talismaninstead ofRobe of the Magi(from +12 int to +6 int, +3 str, +3 agi, +3 dmg)
  • Magic Weaknessduration increased from 20 to 25 seconds
